interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: KoluaWax | Beach Legs Hard Wax Beads (1lb Bag) | For Legs, Back & More | Lavender
Review Date: 2021/05/17
Store: KoluaWax
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Wax', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Body', 'Material Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Material Type Free': 'Paraben Free', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Package Dimensions': '11.85 x 5.98 x 2.56 inches; 1.09 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'BEACHLEGS'}
Review Text: This wax is elastic and covers large areas well. I have dark course hair, and this worked great on my legs. My skin is generally more on the sensitive side, but I had no irritation from this wax.
Review Title: Good for legs
Rating: 5.0

reference_summary:
Gaming Headphones Chamvict Xbox One Headset with Stereo Sound Ps4 Headset with Mic Noise Canceling for PS4,PC,Laptop,Cell Phone,Xbox,Find Enemies Before They Find You Chamvict ['Why to choose us', "1. 【Splendid stereo audio output】Bring you an immersive game experience with stereo sound.You can get clear sound and accurately judge the enemies’ direction especially in “Playerunknown's Battlegrounds” 2. 【360° Noise canceling mic】We adopt intelligent chip to cancel outside noise.Just enjoy your own game world.You can judge the enemies direction and shoot in time without any noise.Victory is yours!The mic is flexible and can be adjusted to different angle for 360° 3. 【Comfy for long time wearing】With an extreme light of 0.87pounds, it is professionally designed for long time wearing and relieve your tiredness.The earmuff is breathable and soft, which can give your ear a comfy touch with less stress and keep cool when gaming for long time 4. 【Skin-friendly earmuff】Made of superior PU leather material, the earmuff is friendly to your skin 5. 【Convenient volume and mic adjustment】You can adjust game sound volume via the pulley and turn on/off mic via the switch anytime when don’t use it", 'Tips for PS4', '1. Plug 3.5mm cable into the console 2. Long press PS4 button and go to system setting 3. Go to “PERIPHERAL MACHINE”, ”ADJUST SOUND AND DEVICES”, choose “OUTPUT TO THE HEADPHONES”, select “ALL AUDIO”', 'Multiple platform compatibility', '★Play station 4 ★Nintendo switch/3DS ★Cell phone with 3.5mm audio interface ★Xbox one/360: It need a microsoft adapter(not included) when connect to old version xbox one ★Laptop/PC/macbook: Need a pc extension cord(included), plug mic and audio cord into your PC, laptop, macbook', 'Specification', '★Drive Diameter: 50mm ★Frequency: 20HZ-20KHZ ★Sensitivity: 102±3DB ★Mic Diameter: 4.0×1.5mm ★Mic Sensitivity: -38±3DB ★Cable Length: 6.6ft ★Size: 8.1×4.1×8.7inch ★N.W.: 0.873pounds ★G.W.: 1.12Pounds'] {'Brand': 'Chamvict', 'Color': 'Black', 'Form Factor': 'Over Ear', 'Connectivity Technology': 'Wired', 'Special Feature': 'Noise Canceling, Microphone Included', 'Package Dimensions': '9.1 x 7.8 x 4.3 inches; 1.09 Pounds', 'Manufacturer': 'Dongguan Guanbiao Trading Co.,Ltd'} These headphones have really decent quality for some budget headphones. The sound is pretty clear coming through and the ear pieces are super cushy.

Unfortunately, where these headphones fall short for me is the fit. They don’t fit snug at all, it’s almost as if the ear pieces just hang off the top of my ears. It’s definitely usable, but loose fitting in my opinion.

Other than that, they are pretty monster headphones, so just be sure you’re ready to be wearing size huge. I honestly wouldn’t have a problem with the size of the headphones if they fit better. I’m too afraid to make sudden movements because they feel like they will slip off. Comfortable, but loose fitting VIRTUE Shaping Spray, 7 oz {'Product Dimensions': '2 x 2 x 9.5 inches; 8.78 Ounces', 'UPC': '817023022168'} I have medium thickness curly hair that is very frizz prone in humid weather, so a shaping spray is a must for me on those humid days. Since I have curly hair, I avoid any products with sulfates to prevent dry hair, so I’m very happy this product is sulfate free. It has a nice scent and does a great job preventing frizz. What I like most is that it doesn’t change the texture of my hair too much- none of that crunchy hair spray feel. It also has a nice scent, but it’s not too strong or overpowering. However, for the price point, I’m not sure I could justify continued use of this product. Great hold without the crunch 9 Pieces Waterproof Shower Cap,Dot Plastic Shower Caps Waterproof Reusable Large Elastic Bath Hair Cap,Beauty Salon Spa Shower Caps Lace Elastic Band Printed Hat Protection Hair Bath Caps Shower Caps BeeGift {} I use shower caps for a slightly unconventional purpose- covering my bread bowl while the dough proofs. I like it because they’re easy to take off and on when the dough needs to be folded, and they provide a more secure seal if I’m doing an overnight proof, so I don’t need to worry about the top of the dough drying out. These have worked great for that purpose. Work great Waxing Kit,Wax Warmer Hair Removal for Women Men,upgrade Portable Wax Kit with Scented Hard Wax Beans,Wax Machine for sensitive skin Full Body at home waxing or on vacation JAPUSOON {'Item Form': 'Wax', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Brand': 'JAPUSOON', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '7.52 x 7.4 x 5.2 inches; 1.41 Pounds', 'UPC': '750440491196'} The warmer works well, melting the wax in 10-15 minutes. After the wax is melted you can lower the temp to keep it warm, but not so hot that it will burn your skin. The kit comes with enough wax for at least a full leg wax (both legs). The kit comes with popsicle sticks for application. This was my first time home waxing, so it took me a bit to get my technique down, but definitely doable on your own. Great for home use KoluaWax | Beach Legs Hard Wax Beads (1lb Bag) | For Legs, Back & More | Lavender KoluaWax {'Item Form': 'Wax', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Body', 'Material Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Material Type Free': 'Paraben Free', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Package Dimensions': '11.85 x 5.98 x 2.56 inches; 1.09 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'BEACHLEGS'} This wax is elastic and covers large areas well. I have dark course hair, and this worked great on my legs. My skin is generally more on the sensitive side, but I had no irritation from this wax. Good for legs
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Interests:** The user has a strong interest in gaming and technology, with a focus on audio quality and comfort for extended sessions. Their engagement in personal grooming has notably expanded to include hair care products suitable for curly hair and humidity resistance, as well as body waxing solutions.

- **Product Preferences:** They prioritize budget-friendly products that provide decent sound quality, comfort, and essential features like noise cancellation. They are increasingly interested in effective and easy-to-use at-home grooming options, reflecting their commitment to enhancing personal care routines.

- **Comfort Needs:** Comfort remains paramount across all product categories, with a strong preference for cushioned and breathable materials. The user is sensitive to fit, often critiquing products that do not conform well to their needs.

- **Usage Context:** The user engages in multi-platform gaming, requiring versatile product compatibility, while they also explore innovative personal grooming methods for home and travel.

- **Feedback Trends:** They provide constructive and detailed reviews, highlighting both strengths and weaknesses in product performance and fit, which showcases their analytical approach to evaluations.

- **Rating Behavior:** They tend to rate products moderately to highly, indicating a balanced perspective on quality, price, and overall satisfaction, while remaining discerning about the value offered by higher-priced items.

Overall, the user's profile reflects a functional approach to both gaming and personal care, emphasizing comfort, affordability, and innovation in everyday tasks, with recent positive experiences in body grooming contributing to their expanding interests.
